Package com.webcheckers.util

Class Message

java.lang.Object
com.webcheckers.util.Message
public final class Message
extends java.lang.Object
A UI-friendly representation of a message to the user.

This is a DDD Value Object. This implementation is immutable and also supports a JSON representation.

Author:
Bryan Basham

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Message.Type
    The type of Message; either information or an error.
